sect2.title: Installation of db-&db-3.3-version;
sect2.para: Install db-&db-3.3-version; by running the following commands:

screen.userinput: cd build_unix && ../dist/configure --prefix=/opt/db-3.3 --enable-compat185 \ --enable-static --enable-shared && make docdir=/opt/db-3.3/doc/Berkeley-DB all install && cd /opt/db-3.3/lib/ && ln -sf libdb-3.3.a libdb.a && mv libdb-3*so /usr/lib && sed 's/^DB185/DB/' /opt/db-3.3/include/db_185.h > /opt/db-3.3/include/db_185.h.new && mv /opt/db-3.3/include/db_185.h.new /opt/db-3.3/include/db_185.h && install -d /usr/include/db3 && mv /opt/db-3.3/include/* /usr/include/db3
